MemberSignature.Value: public override string ToString ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String
public: override System::String ^ ToString();

summary.span: 傳回表示這個矩陣的字串。

span.span: Returns a string that represents this matrix.
The string representation of this matrix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回字串中的數值會使用目前文化特性的慣例來格式化。The numeric values in the returned string are formatted by using the conventions of the current culture. 例如，EN-US 文化特性，則傳回的字串可能會顯示為`{ {M11:1.1 M12:1.2 M13:1.3 M14:1.4} {M21:2.1 M22:2.2 M23:2.3 M24:2.4} {M31:3.1 M32:3.2 M33:3.3 M34:3.4} {M41:4.1 M42:4.2 M43:4.3 M44:4.4} }`。For example, for the en-US culture, the returned string might appear as `{ {M11:1.1 M12:1.2 M13:1.3 M14:1.4} {M21:2.1 M22:2.2 M23:2.3 M24:2.4} {M31:3.1 M32:3.2 M33:3.3 M34:3.4} {M41:4.1 M42:4.2 M43:4.3 M44:4.4} }`.
